channel.title: Game crashes on Lambda Core
channel.description:
This part is where you're supposed to re-enable the pumps. I was on my way out of Coolant 01 when I reached a Loading screen where there are two paths. Here's my system:
AMD A4-5300 AMD Radeon HD 7480D (IGP) 80 GB Seagate HDD 4 GB of RAM Windows 7 Ultimate 64-Bit
Both the Steam Client and my video drivers are up-to-date
